summary: Completed comprehensive testing of 818 EATS weekly batch aggregation system. Backend APIs fully functional with 100% test success rate. Frontend UI working correctly with card-based menu selection, checkout flow, and PayPal integration. Admin dashboard successfully displays batch progress and vote summary.

ui_bugs.issue: Order confirmation page elements not loading properly - data-testid selectors not found
ui_bugs.details: Page loads but specific confirmation elements are missing or have different selectors

design_issues.issue: VIP signup modal appears on order confirmation page blocking content
design_issues.details: 15% discount popup modal interferes with order confirmation page viewing

passed_tests: GET /api/eats/menu returns 4 menu items (Ghana Jollof Rice, Egusi Stew, Suya & Fried Plantains, Waakye) all priced at $25
POST /api/eats/orders creates order with correct batch tracking and total calculation ($35.99 = $25 + $5.99 delivery + $2.00 tax + $3.00 tip)
GET /api/eats/orders/current-batch returns batch progress (4/40 orders, 10% progress)
POST /api/eats/paypal/create-order creates PayPal order with server-side amount validation
Card-based menu selection UI working correctly on /eats page
Batch status banner displays current week progress (4/40 orders)
Checkout modal with tip selection ($0, $2, $3, $5, custom) functioning
PayPal payment integration loads correctly in payment modal
Admin 818 EATS tab shows batch progress (Week 52, 2025: 4 total orders, 0 paid, 40 target, 10% progress)
Admin dashboard displays vote summary with Ghana Jollof Rice leading (4 votes)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix order confirmation page data-testid selectors and consider disabling VIP popup modal on order confirmation pages to improve user experience

success_percentage.frontend: 90% (9/10 major features working, 1 minor UI issue)
